text: Review of Cafe Luna: The service was absolutely terrible. Waited 45 minutes for our order and when it finally arrived, the food was cold and tasteless. The staff seemed completely disorganized and our server was rude when we complained. Will definitely not be returning to this establishment.

Visited Mario's Pizza last night and I was shocked by how bad it was. The pizza was undercooked and soggy. The waitress seemed like she didn't want to be there. Worst dining experience I've had in months.

I don't usually write negative reviews, but I felt compelled to after my experience at The Green Garden. The food was bland and overpriced. Service was slow and unprofessional. Save your money and go elsewhere.
